title: How the Tories and Labour have spent millions on next general election
description: Both parties have splashed the cash on digital campaigning in a bid to gain traction on platforms such as Facebook and Instagram

title: Election Year political updates for agents from Propertymark
description: Propertymark’s monthly political and government update webinars are set to continue in 2024 - General Election year. A statement from the trade body doesn’t hold back on its self-confidence, saying: “Propertymark has a formidable reputation for ...

title: New Hampshire voters weigh in on the key issues for them ahead of primary
description: Voters in New Hampshire will head to the polls and cast their ballots on Tuesday, weighing in on what looks to be the most competitive Republican primary race in the country. According to 538’s polling averages,

title: Trump’s verbal confusions give opening to Haley
description: Nikki Haley is leaning into former President Trump’s verbal miscues as she seeks a game-changing moment ahead of Tuesday’s New Hampshire primary, where her campaign desperately needs a strong

title: Will bad weather keep New Hampshire voters home on Tuesday? Don't count on it
description: Republican voters expected to turn out in record numbers in New Hampshire as Trump and Haley fight for GOP nomination.

title: Can Trump be stopped? Key questions ahead of New Hampshire after DeSantis drops out of race
description: Nowhere is former President Donald Trump more vulnerable early this presidential primary season than New Hampshire

title: DeSantis might be the worst presidential candidate in recent memory
description: Now, DeSantis will go in history as one of the worst candidates in recent memory. Turns out, Mickey Mouse is stronger than you thought. Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis ended his presidential campaign on Sunday, succumbing to the final realization of defeat in a candidacy that once held such promise.

title: Theresa May talks her way into the millions club, writes ANDREW PIERCE
description: Despite still being a serving MP, May found time in the last financial year to the end of March 2023 to amass assets of £1.54 million, according to newly released figures.

title: Biden seeks unlikely write-in victory in New Hampshire
description: President Biden’s name won’t appear on the ballot in Tuesday’s New Hampshire primary. His campaign has not been active in the state, and the Democratic National Committee (DNC) has described the

title: GP funding cut in real terms as appointment waits climb – Lib Dems
description: House of Commons Library research commissioned by the Lib Dems found funding for GP practices had been cut by £350 million in real terms since 2019. The party claims investment in practices for 2022/23 was 6.9% down on 2018/19, taking inflation into account.

title: Ron DeSantis ends 2024 campaign, endorses Trump over Haley as New Hampshire vote looms
description: DeSantis was widely seen as a top contender for the 2024 Republican nomination and a natural heir to Donald Trump, but the Florida governor's support has been declining while Trump's hold on the party's base remains unshakeable.

title: Trump is joined by South Carolina leaders at New Hampshire rally as he tries to undercut Haley
description: Donald Trump surrounded himself with leaders from Nikki Haley’s home state in a show of strength before Tuesday’s New Hampshire primary

title: New Hampshire newspaper endorses Haley: ‘Fireball from the heavens’ to knock out Trump, Biden
description: Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley on Sunday picked up an endorsement from New Hampshire’s Union Leader newspaper, less than two days out from the Granite State’s primary. “If you can select a Republican ballot on Tuesday,

title: Biden is set to RAISE taxes to help fund social security benefits as the president desperately tries to make up ground in polling against Trump ahead of the general election
description: President Joe Biden's camp is examining ways to make up for lost ground in the upcoming election, and raising taxes on the wealthy to bolster Social Security is on the table.

title: What voters in New Hampshire have to say about Nikki Haley and Donald Trump ahead of Tuesday’s primary
description: Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley’s chances in New Hampshire – and by extension, the fate of her campaign – likely hinge on how many independents vote for her in the state’s primary on Tuesday.

title: Yousaf invites Starmer for talks to ‘establish working relationship’
description: Speaking on the BBC’s Sunday With Laura Kuenssberg programme, Mr Yousaf appealed to Sir Keir to work with the SNP on reducing child poverty and strengthening relations between the UK and Scottish governments.

title: Yousaf offers talks with 'next prime minister' Starmer
description: Scotland's First Minister Humza Yousaf has said he is "very willing" to work with the next Labour government if Sir Keir Starmer becomes prime minister. The SNP leader said he was "absolutely sure" that his party would win the most seats in Scotland - despite some polls putting them neck and neck with Labour.

title: Humza Yousaf 'very willing' to work with next Labour government
description: Scotland's First Minister Humza Yousaf has said he is "very willing" to work with the next Labour government if Sir Keir Starmer becomes prime minister. The SNP leader said he was "absolutely sure" that his party would win the most seats in Scotland - despite some polls putting them neck and neck with Labour.

title: Call for action on deepfakes as fears grow among MPs over election threat
description: Survey reveals 70% of MPs are concerned AI-generated content will increase the spread of disinformation ahead of polling day

title: How to Labour-proof your money
description: Labour insists it has “no plans” to increase rates of income tax, or to introduce a wealth tax. But plans change, and the party’s proposals to add levies to private schools, reimpose limits on pension savings and scrap “non-dom” status are fueling fears of wider tax hikes.

title: Conservatives in chaos: is there a path to recovery for Rishi Sunak before next election?
description: The Rwanda shambles, critical byelections and a likely mauling in local polls in May, the PM’s troubles are mounting. Tory optimists do see a way to win, but admit it is narrowing

title: Trump helped a vote scandal go viral. What really happened?
description: When alleged ballot-stuffing was caught on camera in a New England city, Donald Trump and his supporters seized on the voting scandal as evidence of a purported wider problem. But experts say election fraud is rare - and that this case stems from the unique and tumultuous local politics.

title: Ron DeSantis drops out of 2024 Republican presidential race ahead of the New Hampshire primary
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis failed to meet the lofty expectations after his 2022 reelection win, and cut into Donald Trump's voter base in a meaningful way.

title: ‘A total failure to launch’: Why Ron DeSantis was doomed from the start
description: Muddled messages, hiring too many staffers and even a puzzle — how it all went wrong for DeSantis' presidential bid.

title: Kristen Welker presses Sununu on supporting Trump in general election
description: New Hampshire Gov. Chris Sununu (R) on Sunday was repeatedly questioned by NBC anchor Kristen Welker over his pledge to support the eventual Republican nominee, even if it is former President

title: A patchwork anti-Trump crew is rallying around Nikki Haley
description: When former Arkansas Gov. Asa Hutchinson threw his support behind Nikki Haley in the GOP presidential race, his message was as much an indictment of the former president as it was an endorsement of Haley ahead of New Hampshire’s Tuesday primary.

title: Local advocates criticize Statehouse bill that would ban free Election Day bus rides
description: Observers are keeping a close eye on a bill in the Indiana Senate that would prohibit free or reduced fare public transportation service on Election Day as its last chance to be heard in committee approaches.

title: Why This Presidential Front-Runner Is Stirring Fears of the ‘Death of Democracy’
description: Although he dons different personas, the strongman bona fides of Prabowo Subianto date to when Indonesia was a dictatorship led by his former father-in-law.

title: Whitmer pushes Biden to talk more bluntly about abortion
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer is nudging President Joe Biden to lean harder into abortion rights as he seeks to win another term in the White House.

title: Live updates: Trump, Haley rally in New Hampshire as DeSantis skips TV appearances
description: As Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis makes last-minute appearances in New Hampshire, former President Donald Trump and former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley battle ahead of the Tuesday primary.

title: Elise Stefanik generates VP speculation as she campaigns with Trump
description: Rep. Elise Stefanik’s shift from moderate to MAGA has drawn speculation on her prospects as Donald Trump’s pick for vice president if he wins the nomination.

title: Election Watch ’24: Why DeSantis and Haley must stay in the race
description: Iowa might look great for Trump, but the truth is 49% of hard-core Republican voters deserted him. What's that say about the general election?

title: Religious spectacle to mark opening of Ram temple by India's Modi
description: A grand temple to Hindu god Lord Ram opens on Monday on a site in India millions believe is his birthplace, in a religious spectacle led by Prime Minister Narendra Modi months before he seeks a rare third term in elections.

title: Inside New Hampshire Gov. Sununu’s drive to stop Trump, boost Haley
description: Tuesday’s presidential primary is a microcosm of the struggle of old-school Republicans to wrest the party away from Donald Trump

title: Nikki Haley has spent 20 years navigating Republican Party factions. Trump may make that impossible
description: Nikki Haley has spent her political career trying to navigate Republicans’ traditional party establishment and the increasingly powerful conservative base that gave rise to Donald Trump.
